evidence.title: I Have Some Questions for You
evidence.text: for You was published on February 21, 2023 by Viking Press. It spent six weeks on the New York Times Bestseller list, after having debuted at #3. Reception Reviews The Star Tribune and The Wall Street Journal both published positive reviews, with the former praising the novel's "nuance" and the latter positively describing the "expressive imagery" of Makkai's writing. Ron Charles, writing...

img_captions.text: A monkey looks at the other one labeled doc, and Doc looks hesitant.

meme_captions.text: The meme poster was surprised by the reply of his friend, who is appreciating the meme poster as an optimist for just calculating his age.

title.text: best way to break the news

text.text: Doc: How old are you ? Me: 21 next week Doc: Wow you're optimistic mY | VA
